heroSubtitle: The most secure digital voting platform, ensuring the safety and transparency of elections.
candidatesSubtitle: Meet some of the candidates running in the elections.
aboutTitle: Pioneering a New Era of Democracy in Somalia
aboutSubtitle: Our mission is to build a secure, transparent, and accessible digital voting platform for every Somali citizen.
missionSubtitle: One Person, One Vote — Equality and Justice
missionDescription: We are dedicated to empowering the Somali people by providing a trustworthy digital infrastructure for elections. By leveraging modern technology, we aim to eliminate fraud, increase voter participation, and ensure that every voice is heard and counted, fostering a future of stability and progress.
feature1Desc: Utilizing blockchain technology, every vote is cryptographically secured and recorded on an immutable ledger, making tampering virtually impossible.
feature2Desc: Results are verifiable and transparent. Citizens and observers can audit the electoral process in real-time, building unprecedented trust.
feature3Desc: Designed to be simple and accessible, our platform allows eligible citizens to vote securely from anywhere, breaking down geographical barriers.
contactSubtitle: We are here to help. Whether you have a question about voter registration, our technology, or partnership opportunities, please reach out.
value1Desc: We operate with unwavering honesty and transparency. Every decision is guided by a commitment to ethical conduct and accountability.
value2Desc: Democracy is for everyone. We build our platform to be accessible to all Somalis, regardless of location, literacy, or ability.
value3Desc: We continuously push the boundaries of technology to deliver the most secure and user-friendly voting experience possible.
teamSubtitle: A passionate group of Somali innovators dedicated to strengthening our nation's democracy.
getInvolvedTitle: Join Us in Building a Better Future
contactInfoDesc: Fill out the form and our team will respond within 24 hours.
ctaSubtitle: Join us in the democratic progress that will change the future of voting.
footerSlogan: Secure and transparent online voting for Somalia.

hero.title: Discover Our Work: Building a Hopeful Future
hero.subtitle: We are an organization dedicated to the development of Somali society through impactful projects that change people's lives. Our journey began with a dream to create lasting positive change.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.title: Empowering the Community, Building a Nation
mission.description: Our mission is to build a self-sufficient society with the ability to overcome challenges, using educational, health, and economic development programs based on local needs.

items.title: Transparency & Accountability
items.description: We operate with transparency and integrity, ensuring that all our activities are accountable to the community we serve and our donors.

items.title: Collaboration & Partnership
items.description: We believe that cooperation and collaboration are the keys to success. We work closely with local and international organizations to achieve our goals.

items.title: Innovation & Continuous Improvement
items.description: We constantly seek new and innovative ways to address social problems, taking advantage of modern technology and advanced ideas.

team.title: Meet Our Dedicated Team
team.subtitle: Our success depends on our team, which combines experience and knowledge, united by a common vision.

cta.title: Be Part of the Positive Change

signInToVote: Sign in to cast your vote.
registerSubtitle: Join the future of voting in Somalia.
